permissions: Allowed for admins or users who are authorized to update the target project.
side_effects: Transitions the project status to abandoned and records a project abandonment.
validation_notes: Requires --project. Project ID must be a numeric identifier for an existing project. Only projects in editing, submitted, or rejected status can be abandoned. The project must be valid; model validation errors are surfaced.

flags.name: --project
flags.validation: Required; must be a numeric project ID that exists.
